info.name: Prompt Engineering Playbook - Azure OpenAI
info.description:
Collection of Azure OpenAI API requests demonstrating prompt engineering patterns.

This collection includes examples for:
- Chat Completions
- Embeddings
- Various prompt patterns (instruction-based, role-based, RAG, etc.)

**Setup:**
1. Import this collection and the environment file
2. Configure environment variables with your Azure OpenAI credentials
3. Run requests to test different prompt patterns

item.name: Chat Completions

request.description: Basic chat completion request demonstrating instruction-based prompting.
Text summarization using instruction-based prompt pattern.
Text classification using role-based prompt pattern with temperature=0 for deterministic output.
Chain-of-thought prompting for complex reasoning tasks.

item.description: Chat completion examples demonstrating various prompt patterns.
